articles.title: Thailand's northern city Chiang Mai beats Davao and Singapore as safest city in South-East Asia - The Star Online
articles.description: Chiang Mai in the North of Thailand was named South-East Asia’s safest city and the 32nd safest among 416 cities across the world.
articles.content:
BANGKOK, Jan 29 (The Nation Thailand/ANN): Chiang Mai in the North of Thailand was named South-East Asias safest city and the 32nd safest among 416 cities across the world.
